---
title: "Workflow for Large Surveys"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(myrror)
library(pipfaker)
library(tictoc)
```

```{r data}
large_survey_data <- pipfaker::fk_micro
large_survey_data_mod <- large_survey_data |>
  fmutate(welfare = welfare + 0.1)
```

```{r time}

myrror(large_survey_data, large_survey_data_mod, 
       by=c("country", "year"))


```
